data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of F.A.T.A., F.A.T.A., Pakistan that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of F.A.T.A., F.A.T.A., Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 8,224 believers in F.A.T.A. to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,941,376 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 8,224 believers in F.A.T.A., please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of F.A.T.A. who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Kanera people might believe through him.
Father, it’s possible most of the 2,911,880 lost people in  F.A.T.A., F.A.T.A., Pakistan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of F.A.T.A. prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of F.A.T.A..
